Class ChannelService

java.lang.Object
com.powerbi.api.service.ChannelService
@Service public class ChannelService extends Object
Service class responsible for managing Channel entities. Handles operations related to retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting channels, as well as verifying user permissions for channel access and modifications.

  • Constructor Details

    • ChannelService

      public ChannelService()

  • Method Details

    • getChannels

      public List<Channel> getChannels(String username, String search)
      Retrieves a list of channels accessible to the user. Includes public channels and private channels where the user is a member, admin, or owner.
      Parameters:
      username - the user requesting the list of channels
      Returns:
      a list of Channel entities the user has access to

    • getChannel

      public Channel getChannel(String username, Long channelId)
      Retrieves a specific channel based on the given channel ID. The method ensures that the requesting user has permission to access the channel.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the currently authenticated user.
      channelId - The ID of the channel to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Channel object if the user has access.
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - If the channel does not exist.
      org.springframework.security.access.AccessDeniedException - If the user does not have permission to access the channel.

    • getChannelRole

      public ChannelRole getChannelRole(String username, @Nullable Long channelId)
      Retrieves the role of a user in a specific channel. If no channel ID is provided, the method checks if the user is a superuser.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user
      channelId - the ID of the channel (optional)
      Returns:
      the role of the user in the specified channel

    • createChannel

      public Channel createChannel(String username, ChannelDTO channelDTO)
      Creates a new channel and assigns the creating user as the channel owner.
      Parameters:
      username - the user creating the channel
      channelDTO - the data transfer object containing channel details
      Returns:
      the created Channel entity

    • updateChannel

      public Channel updateChannel(String username, ChannelDTO channelDTO)
      Updates an existing channel's details. Only the owner of the channel is authorized to update it.
      Parameters:
      username - the user requesting the update
      channelDTO - the data transfer object containing updated channel details
      Returns:
      the updated Channel entity
      Throws:
      org.springframework.security.access.AccessDeniedException - if the user is not the owner of the channel
      org.springframework.data.rest.webmvc.ResourceNotFoundException - if the channel does not exist

    • deleteChannel

      public void deleteChannel(String username, Long channelId)
      Deletes a channel if the user is the owner.
      Parameters:
      username - the user requesting the deletion
      channelId - the ID of the channel to be deleted
      Throws:
      org.springframework.security.access.AccessDeniedException - if the user is not the owner of the channel
